family_oriented.reason: Standard Tap is not particularly family-oriented, focusing more on adult dining and socializing.

history_oriented.reason: There is no indication of historical or cultural focus at Standard Tap.

activity_oriented.reason: The activity level is low, primarily offering dining and drinking without engaging activities.

nature_oriented.reason: While there is an outdoor deck, it is in an urban area without significant natural scenery.

food_oriented.reason: Standard Tap is strongly food-oriented, with a diverse and high-quality menu featuring locally sourced ingredients.

shopping_oriented.reason: There is no shopping focus at Standard Tap, as it is solely a gastropub.
